name: Airlie Beach Sunset Sail in Style Cruise
description: Step aboard the SV Wings III, a luxurious 60 ft sailing catamaran, and embark on a serene sunset cruise across Airlie Beach Bay. This intimate experience is perfect for those seeking relaxation and a personal atmosphere, with limited guest numbers ensuring a more exclusive vibe. As you sail towards Pioneer Rocks, enjoy breathtaking views of the Whitsunday Islands and the vibrant coastal lights. This is an ideal experience for couples, families, and groups who appreciate stunning sunsets, tranquil waters, and a touch of elegance.
departure_location: Coral Sea Marina Meeting Point B
departure_times: Departs and returns from Coral Sea Marina, Northern End, Meeting Point B Airlie Beach
includes:
2 hours sailing on a SV Wings III
Tropical welcome drink on arrival
Tea varieties & 2 coffee machines
Large spacious decks and top sundeck
3 zoned Spotify playing
Cold refrigeration for BYO, ice and cold filtered water
BYO alcohol, soft drink & juice (no glass - wine & champagne ok)
highlights:
Sail and cruise slowly along the Airlie Beach Bay
Enjoy breathtaking sunset views with Whitsunday Islands in the background
Experience a relaxed and personal atmosphere
Capture stunning sunset selfies on spacious decks
Listen to your favorite playlists with 3 zoned Spotify music onboard
price_tiers: Bring your own drinks: FROM A$110
menu:
**Menu:**
- Antipasto grazing platters
- Delicious dessert canap√©s
ideal_for: Couples, families, and groups looking for a relaxing and intimate sunset sailing experience in the Whitsundays.

name: Whitsunday Islands Sail, SUP & Snorkel Day Tour
description: Experience the Whitsundays on a luxurious day tour aboard Wings III, perfect for those short on time but eager to explore the stunning islands. Relax on the plush sundeck or in the shaded seating area, and soak in the foredeck Jacuzzi while taking in the tropical beauty. This tour offers an exclusive experience with private mooring at Langford Island and flexible anchorage options. Discover the vibrant marine life of the Great Barrier Reef through snorkeling, stand-up paddleboarding, or clear bottom kayaking. Ideal for families and small groups seeking adventure and relaxation in a breathtaking setting.
departure_location: Coral Sea Marina Meeting Point B
includes:
Snorkeling equipment
Stand-up paddleboards
Clear bottom kayak
Morning tea with sweet and savoury platters
Lunch with a selection of meats and salmon
Cold filtered drinking water
Knowledgeable crew
Private mooring at Langford Island
highlights:
Cruise & sail towards Langford Island
Private mooring at Langford Island
Explore the underwater world of the Great Barrier Reef
Encounter vibrant marine life including green sea turtles
Relax on the plush sundeck or in the foredeck Jacuzzi
Small group experience with a maximum of 29 guests
locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hook Island,Langford,Whitsunday Island
menu:
**Menu:**
- Morning Tea: Sweet and savoury platters
- Lunch: Selection of meats and salmon prepared fresh daily
ideal_for: Families, small groups, and adventure seekers looking to explore the Whitsundays in a luxurious and intimate setting.
